data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of lines.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You have to construct an alphabetic pyramid. The top begins with the letters "A"
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of lines.
Output
ALPHABET Pyramid
Constraints
0 < N ≤ 26
Example
Input
10
Output
A
AB
ABC
ABCD
ABCDE
ABCDEF
ABCDEFG
ABCDEFGH
ABCDEFGHI
ABCDEFGHIJ
